title: I personally hate jungling for several reasons
body:
1) 9/10 times there is one laner flaming you because they lost lane and for whatever reason don't wait for you and go 1v1 the laner (S) that are 2 levels ahead
2) It's very hard to play *for me* because I play mainly ap champions and with lethality, my elise nidalee Diana and eve are pretty much all out of meta right now
3) If for whatever reason one lane fails/dies/ any of that, and they team fight, its something I cant control
4)Shot calling is extremely hard in my elo, every player (including myself occasionally ill admit,) wants to be the one to carry and refuses to listen to someone else bc egos op

replies.body:
Jungle is the highest position of control.  Unfortunately it requires smite.  Smite is very bad compared to flash.

Try going without smite and lane till level 5 or 6 then jungle.

Your team will hate you for being in lane early game but they're dumb and it pays off.
